ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: For 18 Years, Sri Arunodayam has been providing a safe and caring environment for abandoned mentally challenged children in Chennai. These children have been abandoned in hospitals and in crowded public places such as railway and bus stations. At times, even in dustbins. At our home they are welcomed, nurtured, fed, clothed, rehabilitated and loved. We try to give these children what they have lost a home and a family. There are 115 children at our home.

2004 COLLEGE OFFERS 20 UG 7 PG PROGRAMMES M PHIL IN 6 AND PH D IN 4 DISCIPLINES WITH AN INNOVATIVE UGC SANCTIONED COURSE ECONOMICS WITH LOGISTICS AND FREIGHT MANAGEMENT THE DIPLOMA COURSE ON CHILDCARE AND CRECHE MANAGEMENT SANCTIONED IN THE YEAR 2015 BY UGC UNDER COMMUNITY COLLEGE SCHEME WOMENS STUDIES CENTRE ESTABLISHED IN THE YEAR 2005 PROMOTE THE LIFE SKILLS FOR PWDS THROUGH LEONARD CESHIRE INCREASE IN THE STUDENT ADMISSION THE CURRICULAR ENRICHMENT HAS INCREASED THE PLACEMENT OPPORTUNITY NUMBER OF PUBLICATIONS IN JOURNALS AND CONFERENCE PROCEEDINGS IN THE LAST 5 YEARS FROM SCIENCE 91 NUMBER OF CONFERENCES WORKSHOPS SEMINARS ORGANIZED BY SCIENCE DEPARTMENT DURING LAST 5 YEARS 14 BOOKS PUBLISHED 2 PROJECTS COMPLETED 2 MAJOR AND 17 MINOR ONGOING 4 COLLEGE HOME JOURNAL MINDSCAPE WITH ISSN 2321 502X THE INDUSTRY INSTITUTE LINKAGES WITH SITARC ICTACT TNAU IBM MULTI SPECIALTY HOSPITALS TEXTILES AND DYE INDUSTRIES IBM CERTIFIED AS COLLEGE WITH HIGHEST NUMBER OF SOFTWARE SKILLS TO STUDENTS IN ONE CAMPUS IN THE YEAR 2014 AND THE ONLY ARTS AND SCIENCE COLLEGE OBTAINED CENTRE OF EXCELLENCE STATUS UNDER MOU WITH IBM CAREER EDUCATION STUDENTS ACHIEVEMENTS ATTENDING HANDS ON TRAINING IN CALIBRATION AND TESTING OF EQUIPMENTS IN NABL ACCREDITED INSTITUTION WITH CERTIFICATION STUDENTS ANNUALLY ATTENDING SUMMER TRAINING PROGRAMMES AND MTTS FOR ADVANCED STUDY IN MATHEMATICS IN REPUTED INSTITUTIONS TAKING UP THE NATIONAL LEVEL GRADUATE PHYSICS EXAMINATION BY ALL THE PHYSICS STUDENTS ORGANIZED IAPT AND WON THE POSITION OF STATE TOPPERS MATHEMATICS STUDENTS PARTICIPATION IN THE INTERCOLLEGIATE COMPETITIONS AND ACHIEVING OVERALL SHIELD THRICE CONTINUOUSLY FROM LADY DOAK COLLEGE MADURAI PARTICIPATING IN THE EXPERIMENTAL WORKSHOPS ORGANIZED BY HOMI BHABA CENTER FOR SCIENCE EDUCATION AND RESEARCH MUMBAI AND INDIAN ACADEMY OF SCIENCES BANGALORE BY PHYSICS STUDENTS EVERY YEAR PG PHYSICS STUDENTS TAKE UP SUMMER INTERNSHIP IN RESEARCH INSTITUTES SUCH AS ARCI HYDERABAD AND CHENNAI CAMPUS IASC RESEARCH LABS OF ANNA UNIVERSITY GANDHIGRAM UNIVERSITY AND BHARATHIAR UNIVERSITY AND ALSO IN TAMILNADU ACADEMY OF SCIENCES MATHEMATICS PHYSICS CHEMISTRY AND ZOOLOGY STUDENTS PARTICIPATION IN NATIONAL LEVEL SEMINAR/CONFERENCES AND PRESENTATION OF PAPERS AND SECURING BEST PRESENTER AWARD FROM VIJAYA COLLEGE BANGALORE PARTICIPATION IN THE NATIONAL ROBOTICS CHAMPIONSHIP ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: We work in the field of community eye care and provide free eye care treatment in rural areas sice last three decades. At present we have eight hospitals in Coimbatore, Guntur, Krishnankoil, Shimoga, Bangalore, Anand, Silvassa and Pammal. All our hospitals provide high quality affordable eye care facilities. We have an Eye Bank which receives one pair of eye every day and is a model eye bank for the country. we train people from rural areas as eye care managers and generate employement for the state in which we operate along with development of valuable manpower in healthcare sector. We won: Indian NGO Award 2008 for the best NGO in the large category Asian Management Award for Diabetic Retinopathy Program in 2007 We have been conducting free eye camps in villages without fail for the last two decades

sourceOfFunds.purpose: Solar Technician Training: The skill programme envisaged by MNRE is established with strategies to address skills issues, including appropriate training components. The importance of labour is particularly apparent in the renewable energy sector. In this situation, there are clear economic benefits in maximising labour productivity and eliminating the need to replace sub-standard work. Labour productivity and quality of work are both related closely to skills quality.

The National policy for Skill Development, 2015 has projected a shortage of 109 Million skilled persons by 2022 and called for an integrated effort to step up skilling of youth under the Pradhan Mantri Kaushal Vikas Yojana (PMKVY) Ministry of Human Resource development has authorised AICTE to conduct the programme through various institutes approved by them
